snippet: A criminal drunken-driving charge was dismissed Tuesday against Bishop Robert McManus of Worcester, Mass., who pleaded guilty to refusing an alcohol test after an accident.
abstract: Drunken-driving charge is dismissed against Bishop Robert McManus of Worcester, Mass, who pleaded guilty to refusing alcohol test after accident.
lead_paragraph: A criminal drunken-driving charge was dismissed Tuesday against Bishop Robert McManus of Worcester, Mass., who pleaded guilty to refusing an alcohol test after an accident.

headline.main: Rhode Island: Bishop’s Criminal Charge Dropped
headline.print_headline: Rhode Island: Bishop’s Criminal Charge Dropped
